author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description: Extracts IP addresses on block lists from AbuseIPDB, and Populates Indicators accordingly.
automation.name: AbuseIPDBPopulateIndicators

commands.description: Checks the specified IP address against the AbuseIP database.
commands.name: ip

commands.description: Queries a block of IP addresses to check against the database.
commands.name: abuseipdb-check-cidr-block

commands.description: Reports an IP address to AbuseIPDB.
commands.name: abuseipdb-report-ip

commands.description: Returns a list of the most reported IP addresses.
commands.name: abuseipdb-get-blacklist

commands.description: Returns a list of report categories from AbuseIPDB.
commands.name: abuseipdb-get-categories

integration.description: Central repository to report and identify IP addresses that have been associated with malicious activity online. Check the Detailed Information section for more information on how to configure the integration.
integration.name: AbuseIPDB

description: Central repository to report and identify IP addresses that have been associated with malicious activity online. Check the Detailed Information section for more information on how to configure the integration.
name: AbuseIPDB
